update Inst_Nursing set Administration_Code = #{administrationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Administration_Name = #{administrationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DetailsOfNursing_ObservationItem = #{nursingObservationItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DetailsOfNursing_ObservationResult = #{nursingObservationResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DetailsOfNursing_Operation = #{nursingOperation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DetailsOfNursing_Result = #{nursingResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DetailsOfNursing_TypeOfItem = #{nursingItemType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DosageUnit = #{dosageUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Dosage = #{dosage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EncounterIdentifier = #{visitID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FrequencyCount = #{frequencyCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FrequencyDescription = #{frequencyDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FrequencyIntervalUnit = #{frequencyIntervalUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FrequencyInterval = #{frequencyInterval,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Issues = #{issues,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NursingCategory_Code = #{nursingCategoryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NursingCategory_Name = #{nursingCategoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NursingLevel = #{nursingLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OrderIdentifier = #{orderID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PatientIdentifier_Id = #{patientID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Suggest = #{suggest,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where NursingIdentifier = #{nursingID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
